content:
I am very interested in helping with the deref patterns. I have never contributed to rust core before. Looking at the tracking issue and wg it hasn't moved in a few months.
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/87121
https://github.com/rust-lang/project-deref-patterns

I could help with initial implementation or anything else if I could get help with mentoring on the rust internals.
